name: An Alien's Challenge
description:
Description:

This is a linear rail shooter where you have to shoot coins to increase your score.

Plot:

The plot is that a mysterious portal temporarily opened up and gifted you a gun and a note saying to meet at a specific building, and there you find that you need to shoot as many coins as you can to increase your score.

Controls:

M1 to fire.

M2 to speed up the game.

M3 to pause the game.

Warning, the HTML build has some not intended lighting and mouse sensitivity and the PC is lacking the skip intro button due to some bugs .

This game was made for the 8-Bit-to-Infinity Mouse Only jam with the theme of Another World.
